title: Mixed Signals: A Diverse Point Cloud Dataset for Heterogeneous LiDAR V2X Collaboration
author: Katie Z Luo (Cornell University), Minh-Quan Dao (Inria), Zhenzhen Liu (Cornell University), Mark Campbell (Cornell University), Wei-Lun Chao (The Ohio State University), Kilian Q Weinberger (Cornell University), Ezio Malis (Inria), Vincent Fremont (Ecole Centrale de Nantes)
relevance_why: The dataset provides high-quality, synchronized multi-sensor data that could be useful for training models in collaborative perception, which can be applicable to audio-visual tasks in multimodal systems.
background: The task setting involves collecting a comprehensive dataset of 3D point clouds and bounding boxes from multiple vehicles and roadside units using heterogeneous LiDAR setups for vehicle-to-everything communication.
contribution: The Mixed Signals dataset introduces heterogeneous connected autonomous vehicle LiDAR configurations to support diverse real-world V2X perception scenarios, achieving high-quality data suitable for training models.
technical_comparison: Previous methods rely on homogeneous sensor setups, limiting their applicability in real-world scenarios. This work improves by integrating different LiDAR configurations from multiple vehicles and infrastructure, enhancing diversity and realism.
key_innovation: Combines various types of LiDAR sensors and captures data from a left-hand traffic driving country, aligning data accurately across different vehicles and environments.
real_world_impact: The dataset could significantly improve the training and deployment of autonomous vehicle systems by providing realistic and diverse data, helping address the complexities of urban driving environments.

new_terms.LiDAR: **Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR)** is a remote sensing method used to examine the surface of the Earth, using pulses of light to measure distances to a target.
new_terms.CAV: **Connected Autonomous Vehicle (CAV)** refers to vehicles that communicate with other vehicles and infrastructure to enhance their awareness and navigation capabilities.

open_sourcing: Dataset and annotations are available at https://mixedsignalsdataset.cs.cornell.edu/
